94246.大きくて 立派な扉がある。\nしかし 特別な封印が ほどこされていて\n開けるこ:
There is a large, elegant door. However, a special
seal upon it seems to prevent it from being opened.

90885.石碑には 古代文字が刻まれている……。\nなんと書いてあるのか まるで わからな:
An ancient script is carved into the stone monument...
What is written is completely unknown.

90886.石碑には 古代文字が刻まれているようだ……。\n<br>\n<pc>は\n古代文:
An ancient script is carved into the stone monument...
tried using the lexicon to decipher the ancient script!
Somehow the stone monument was used in a special dancing ritual, the dance itself is written upon it, it seems.
learned the emote, "Sun Dance"!

90887.石碑には 特別な儀式で用いられる舞踊の\n踊り方について 書かれているようだ。:
The stone monument was used in a special dancing
ritual, the dance itself is written upon it, it seems.

93414.しぐさ『たいようのおどり』を 踊るには\n<emoji RightTrigger:
To use the "Sun Dance" emote, press the <emoji RightTrigger> and select
it from the "Emotes" list!
